pli-tv-pvr18:1.1.eng: There are offenses that are committed unintentionally, but cleared intentionally.
pli-tv-pvr18:1.1.comm: For this and the following three items, see Pvr 7:46.13–46.16.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.2.eng: There are offenses that are committed intentionally, but cleared unintentionally.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.3.eng: There are offenses that are committed unintentionally and cleared unintentionally.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.4.eng: There are offenses that are committed intentionally and cleared intentionally.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.5.eng: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind and cleared with a wholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.6.eng: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind, but cleared with an unwholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.7.eng: There are offenses that are committed with a wholesome mind, but cleared with an indeterminate mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.8.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind, but cleared with a wholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.9.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind and cleared with an unwholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.10.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an unwholesome mind, but cleared with an indeterminate mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.11.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind, but cleared with a wholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.12.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind, but cleared with an unwholesome mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:1.13.eng: There are offenses that are committed with an indeterminate mind and cleared with an indeterminate mind.

pli-tv-pvr18:2.1.eng: How many originations does the first offense entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:2.3.pli: Kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.

pli-tv-pvr18:3.1.eng: How many originations does the second offense entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:3.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:3.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:3.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:3.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:3.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:4.1.eng: How many originations does the third offense entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:4.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:4.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:4.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:4.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:4.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:5.1.eng: How many originations does the fourth offense entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:5.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:5.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:5.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:5.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:5.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:6.1.eng: The four offenses entailing expulsion are finished.

pli-tv-pvr18:7.1.pli: Upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:7.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for emitting semen by means of effort. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:7.2.pli: Upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:7.3.pli: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.

pli-tv-pvr18:8.1.pli: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:8.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for making physical contact with a woman. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:8.2.pli: Mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:8.3.pli: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.

pli-tv-pvr18:9.1.pli: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:9.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for speaking indecently to a woman. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:9.2.pli: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsentassa saṅghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:9.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:9.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:9.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:9.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:9.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:10.1.pli: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:10.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for encouraging a woman to satisfy one’s own desires. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:10.2.pli: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṅghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr18:11.1.pli: Sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:11.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for acting as a matchmaker. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:11.2.pli: Sañcarittaṃ samāpajjantassa saṅghādiseso chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:11.3.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.3.eng: body, not speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.4.pli: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.4.eng: speech, not body or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.5.eng: body and speech, not mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.6.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.6.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.7.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:11.7.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:11.8.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:12.1.pli: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:12.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for having a hut built by means of begging. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:12.2.pli: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr18:13.1.pli: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:13.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for having a large dwelling built. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:13.2.pli: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṅghādiseso chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr18:14.1.pli: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:14.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for groundlessly charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:14.2.pli: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr18:15.1.pli: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:15.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for charging a monk with an offense entailing expulsion, using an unrelated legal issue as a pretext. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:15.2.pli: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṅghādiseso tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr18:16.1.pli: Saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:16.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop pursuing schism in the Sangha when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:16.2.pli: Saṅghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:16.3.pli: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:17.1.pli: Bhedakānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantānaṃ saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:17.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for monks who do not stop siding with one who is pursuing schism in the Sangha when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:17.2.pli: Bhedakānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantānaṃ saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:17.3.pli: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:18.1.pli: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:18.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop being difficult to correct when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:18.2.pli: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:18.3.pli: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:19.1.pli: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:19.1.eng: There is an offense entailing suspension for a monk who does not stop being a corrupter of families when pressed for the third time. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:19.2.pli: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṅghādiseso ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:19.3.pli: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.

pli-tv-pvr18:20.1.eng: The thirteen offenses entailing suspension are finished

pli-tv-pvr18:21.0.eng: 3. The rules to be trained in

pli-tv-pvr18:21.2.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa dukkaṭaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti?
pli-tv-pvr18:21.2.eng: There is an offense of wrong conduct for, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water. How many originations does it have?

pli-tv-pvr18:21.3.pli: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karontassa dukkaṭaṃ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti—

pli-tv-pvr18:21.4.pli: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.

pli-tv-pvr18:22.1.eng: The rules to be trained in are finished.

pli-tv-pvr18:23.1.eng: How many originations do the four offenses entailing expulsion have?

pli-tv-pvr18:23.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:23.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:23.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:23.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:23.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:24.1.eng: How many originations do the thirteen offenses entailing suspension have?

pli-tv-pvr18:24.3.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.3.eng: body, not speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:24.4.pli: siyā vācato samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.4.eng: speech, not body or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:24.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.5.eng: body and speech, not mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:24.6.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.6.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:24.7.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:24.7.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:24.8.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:25.1.eng: How many originations do the two undetermined offenses have?

pli-tv-pvr18:25.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:25.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:25.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:25.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:25.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:26.1.pli: Tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
pli-tv-pvr18:26.1.eng: How many originations do the thirty offenses entailing relinquishment have?

pli-tv-pvr18:26.2.pli: Tiṃsa nissaggiyā pācittiyā chahi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—

pli-tv-pvr18:26.3.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:26.3.eng: body, not speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:26.4.pli: siyā vācato samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:26.4.eng: speech, not body or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:26.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:26.5.eng: body and speech, not mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:26.6.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:26.6.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:26.7.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:26.7.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:26.8.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:27.1.eng: How many originations do the ninety-two offenses entailing confession have?

pli-tv-pvr18:27.3.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:27.3.eng: body, not speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:27.4.pli: siyā vācato samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:27.4.eng: speech, not body or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:27.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:27.5.eng: body and speech, not mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:27.6.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:27.6.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:27.7.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:27.7.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:27.8.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:28.1.eng: How many originations do the four offenses entailing acknowledgment have?

pli-tv-pvr18:28.3.pli: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.3.eng: body, not speech or mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:28.4.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.4.eng: body and speech, not mind; or

pli-tv-pvr18:28.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:28.5.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:28.6.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:29.1.eng: How many originations do the seventy-five rules to be trained in have?

pli-tv-pvr18:29.3.pli: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr18:29.3.eng: body and mind, not speech; or

pli-tv-pvr18:29.4.pli: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr18:29.4.eng: speech and mind, not body; or

pli-tv-pvr18:29.5.pli: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.

pli-tv-pvr18:32.3.eng: By the method that accords with the Teaching,
